title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP]BuildCraft(建筑)v6.0.17[自带中文]
author: TZZS.G
txt_content:
1.7.10的建筑mod终于来了！


更新记录
Fixes GL Errors and changes more deprecated functionality to equivalentFixed laser data not existing in some cases
Fixed ghost facades from pre-6.0.x worlds
Prevent a possible crash when rendering a marker
Even more parameterization and cleanup! 
Replace .getAABBPool() and .getWorldVec3Pool() for 1.7.10 compatibility
Made sure Version IMC message is also sent after init phase 
Added Version Checker integration and fixed changelog grabbing
Fix isFullFluidBlock -> fix Floodgates

貌似没啥大更新，主要修复了一些bug
老图片(无所谓啦)
